dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 32 IS: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Israel of certain defense articles and services.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sanders introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Israel of certain defense articles and services.

section.text: That the following proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Israel is prohibited:

paragraph.text: The sale of the following defense articles and services described in Transmittal No. 24â€“38, submitted to Congress pursuant to section 36(b)(1) of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2776(b)(1)), and published in the Congressional Record on March 3, 2025: D9R and D9T Caterpillar bulldozers; spare and repair parts; corrosion protection; publications and technical documentation; pre-delivery inspections; U.S. Government and contractor support; technical and logistics support services; storage; and other related elements of logistics and program support.
